text: "As She's Walking Away" is a 2010 song by Zac Brown Brown featuring Alan Jackson. It is the leading single from their second studio album You Get What You Give. It went to number 32 in the United States, number 49 in Canada and topped the country single charts in both the United States and Canada. It won a Grammy Award in 2011. ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Zac Brown Band songs Category:Alan Jackson songs
title: As She's Walking Away
